verses.verse: <S%G1223%G5124>Therefore<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to give the more <S%G4056>earnest<s%> <S%G4337>heed<s%> to the things which we have <S%G191>heard<s%>, lest at any <S%G3379>time<s%> we should let them <S%G3901>slip<s%>.

<S%G4459>How<s%> shall <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1628>escape<s%>, if we <S%G272>neglect<s%> so <S%G5082>great<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%>; <S%G3748>which<s%> at the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G2983>began<s%> to be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, and was <S%G950>confirmed<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> them that <S%G191>heard<s%> him;

<S%G2316>God<s%> also bearing them <S%G4901>witness<s%>, <S%G5037>both<s%> with <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3311>gifts<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G2308>will<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> unto the <S%G32>angels<s%> hath <S%G5293>he<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> put in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> the <S%G3625>world<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>, <S%G4012%G3739>whereof<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> in a certain <S%G4225>place<s%> <S%G1263>testified<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou art <S%G3403>mindful<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%>? <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> thou <S%G1980>visitest<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?

Thou <S%G1642>madest<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G1024%G5100>little<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%>; thou <S%G4737>crownedst<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> didst <S%G2525>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%>:

Thou hast <S%G5293>put<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> that he <S%G5293>put<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> in subjection <S%G5293>under<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he <S%G863>left<s%> nothing that is <S%G3762>not<s%> put <S%G506>under<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> we <S%G3708>see<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> put <S%G5293>under<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> was <S%G1642>made<s%> a <S%G1024%G5100>little<s%> <S%G1642>lower<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G3804>suffering<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G4737>crowned<s%> with <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5092>honour<s%>; <S%G3704>that<s%> <S%G1089>he<s%> by the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should <S%G1089>taste<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> every <S%G3956>man<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> it <S%G4241>became<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, in <S%G71>bringing<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, to <S%G5048>make<s%> the <S%G747>captain<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3804>sufferings<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> he that <S%G37>sanctifieth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they who are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%>: <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> he <S%G1870>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>,

<S%G3004>Saying<s%>, I will <S%G518>declare<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> unto <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> will I sing <S%G5214>praise<s%> unto <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

<S%G1893>Forasmuch<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as the <S%G3813>children<s%> are <S%G2841>partakers<s%> of <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G3348>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3898>likewise<s%> took <S%G3348>part<s%> of the <S%G846>same<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he might <S%G2673>destroy<s%> him that <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G2904>power<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, that <S%G5123>is<s%>, the <S%G1228>devil<s%>;

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1222>verily<s%> he <S%G1949>took<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1949>on<s%> him the nature of <S%G32>angels<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> he took <S%G1949>on<s%> him the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>.

<S%G3606>Wherefore<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> it behoved <S%G3784>him<s%> to be made <S%G3666>like<s%> unto his <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G1655>merciful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> high <S%G749>priest<s%> in things pertaining <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> make reconciliation <S%G2433>for<s%> the <S%G266>sins<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3958>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> hath <S%G3958>suffered<s%> being <S%G3985>tempted<s%>, he is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G997>succour<s%> them that are <S%G3985>tempted<s%>.
